original_text: “Therefore wild beasts shall dwell with hyenas in Babylon, and ostriches shall dwell in her. She shall never again have people, nor be inhabited for all generations.
korean_text: 그러므로 사막의 들짐승이 승냥이와 함께 거기에 살겠고 타조도 그 가운데에 살 것이요 영원히 주민이 없으며 대대에 살 자가 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore wild beasts shall dwell with hyenas in Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 들짐승이 하이에나와 함께 바벨론에 살 것이며

sentences.original_text: and ostriches shall dwell in her
She shall never again have people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 다시는 사람이 살지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: nor be inhabited for all generations.
